dict.string: Tastefull stained hardwood and elegant crown moulding stand out under the dust. The room is vacant except for pieces of art along two of the walls. There are five paintings and a bust on a pedestal.

array.string: Look at the other large portrait

dict.string: Two loveseats face each other with a cofee table in between. A jagged hole is in the middle of the table.
A long dining table covere with a cloth that use to be white takes up most of the room. There are places set for ten people. A cradenza sits against one wall.
